title: I can't change the future but I can warn you of it
body: The league of legends community is sadly passed the point of any possible solution. I won't set and rant about a rotting corpse,  So I propose we wait out the storm. Let this whole place implode onto itself and return after the damage is done and hope that Riot can learn from the once chard remains of its populace

replies.body: I love how just the down votes are enough to prove my point
